mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Fighters A Platoon, April 1973
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Salem Fire Fighters A Platoon, April 1973, the following people are in the photograph: the man in the bottom row third from the left is Doug Conner, Don Knowjen is in the top row furthest to the left, someone whose only given name is Heltherd is in the top row second from the left, Jim Summer is in the top row third from the left, Tom Bacon is in the bottom row furthest to the left, Charlie Kurt is in the bottom row second from the left, Conney Bill is in the bottom row third from the left, David Holden is in the bottom row fourth from the left.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
